title: Dystopian Ambient Soundscapes Vol. 2
description: The second version from a collection of dystopian ambient soundscapes, perfect for creating an eerie, dark and sinister atmosphere for your Horror, Dark Fantasy or Post Apocalypse. Contains 100 different soundscapes with a total length of 150 minutes.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/sets/dystopian-ambient-soundscapes-vol-2

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/2mzdmdila12zw4y/MSE%20-%20Dystopian%20Ambient%20Soundscapes%20Vol.%202.pdf?dl=0


The package contains 100 different ambient soundscapes with a total length of 150 minutes.


These soundscapes embody something otherworldly and mystical, as if ancient and shamanic rituals were created to these ambiences.


Immerse your audience in darkness and mystic, scary, eerie and thrilling atmosphere with dark ambient soundscapes, melodic phrases of musical instruments, mystical voices, sounds of fear and upcoming danger.


Use this asset to create a scary and sinister atmosphere in your locations and worlds, whether it's a strange alien place, a lonely chapel haunt, a mysterious forest with otherworldly voices, a lair of demonic lords, a ruined fortress with lost souls, an area with an army of undead, a hideout of the devil himself.


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 100 game-ready sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • perfect for animations, trailers, game scenes for dark fantasy, horror, post apocalypse, science fiction and more


Number of Audio Waves: 100

Number of Audio Cues: 100

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 150 minutes 00 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
